bio.short: Founding architect of Sitecore XM Cloud and leader in CMS platform development. Building the future of content management in the Age of AI.
bio.full:
I'm the founding architect of Sitecore XM Cloud, where I architected and built the platform from concept to global SaaS launch. As a leader in CMS platform development with a lifelong passion for software craftsmanship, my journey began at age 8 when I taught myself to code by reading PC magazines my mom brought home from work. This early foundation gave me deep understanding of how software systems evolve and what it takes to build platforms that truly last.

I led XM Cloud from inception through POC to architectural blueprint to execution and production launch. After launch, I focused on cost optimization and architectural redesign, achieving significant cost reductions while re-architecting the platform's tenancy and infrastructure to deliver millions in ongoing savings. I drove the cultural and technical transformation to continuous delivery, fundamentally changing how the platform ships and scales.

My expertise lies in building CMS platforms themselves - architecting the engines, APIs, and infrastructure that enable content management at enterprise scale. From those early days learning programming fundamentals to building applicant tracking systems, time management platforms, and eventually enterprise content management and digital experience platforms, I've consistently built the software that others build upon.

At Altudo, I'm pioneering the future of CMS platforms in the Age of AI, developing agentic workflows and AI-driven experiences that fundamentally transform how content management systems operate. I'm not just implementing AI features - I'm reimagining how CMS platforms can leverage AI to accelerate implementation, enhance authoring experiences, and deliver intelligent content orchestration.

Throughout my professional career, I've specialized in platform architecture and product development across consulting firms and product companies - from building internal platforms at TempWorks and ILM to architecting enterprise solutions at Horizontal Integration, Perficient, Avanade, and ultimately leading platform development at Sitecore.

My approach combines decades of hands-on development experience with platform engineering expertise, AI innovation, and product strategy. Having grown up alongside the evolution of software development, I understand both the fundamentals and the cutting edge, always focusing on building systems that scale to serve millions while enabling developers and content creators to achieve more. I thrive at the intersection of Platform Engineering and AI - architecting next-generation CMS platforms, building intelligent developer experiences, and defining how content management evolves in an AI-driven world.

Whether it's enterprise platforms serving millions of users or innovative AI workflows that transform content operations, I believe in building platform foundations that last and enable others to create extraordinary digital experiences. That same curiosity that drove me to learn from PC magazines as a child continues to fuel my passion for pushing the boundaries of what's possible in software development.
